sql_injection.description: The app validates and sanitizes all untrusted inputs. Ensure that inputs are validated to prevent Injection attacks.

webview_xss.description: The app uses WebViews securely. WebViews should be configured to prevent sensitive data leakage and functionalities like JavaScript bridges should be restricted.

insecure_webview.description: The app uses WebViews securely. Ensure that WebViews do not expose critical interfaces or allow untrusted content to access internal resources.

hardcoded_secrets.description: The app prevents leakage of sensitive data. Ensure that no sensitive data, such as API keys or passwords, is hardcoded in the source code.

insecure_storage.description: The app securely stores sensitive data. Ensure that sensitive data is stored securely using the Android Keystore system or EncryptedSharedPreferences.

insecure_file_permissions.description: The app securely stores sensitive data. Ensure that the app uses appropriate file permissions (e.g., Context.MODE_PRIVATE) to protect data.

insecure_random_number_generation.description: The app employs current strong cryptography and uses it according to industry best practices. Use SecureRandom instead of weak RNGs.

biometric_bypass.description: The app performs local authentication securely according to the platform best practices. Check for weak implementations of BiometricPrompt.

intent_spoofing.description: The app uses IPC mechanisms securely. Ensure that exported components are protected with permissions or intents are validated.

exported_components.description: The app uses IPC mechanisms securely. Ensure that components (Activities, Services, Receivers) are not exported unless necessary.

webview_deeplink.description: The app uses WebViews securely. Ensure that deep links loading into WebViews are properly validated to prevent URL manipulation.

deeplink_hijack.description: The app uses IPC mechanisms securely. Ensure that the app verifies the origin and integrity of data received via deep links.

path_traversal.description: The app validates and sanitizes all untrusted inputs. Ensure that file inputs are validated to prevent Path Traversal attacks.

jetpack_compose_security.description: The app uses the user interface securely. Ensure that UI components handle sensitive data securely and do not leak information.

graphql_injection.description: The app validates and sanitizes all untrusted inputs. Ensure that API inputs are validated to prevent injection attacks.

pending_intent_hijacking.description: The app uses IPC mechanisms securely. Ensure that PendingIntents are created as immutable where possible to prevent privilege escalation.

fragment_injection.description: The app uses IPC mechanisms securely. Ensure that exported activities with preference headers validate input fragments to prevent RCE.

zip_slip.description: The app validates and sanitizes all untrusted inputs. Ensure that file paths in zip archives are validated during extraction to prevent path traversal.

deeplink_logic_bypass.description: The app uses IPC mechanisms securely. Ensure deep links properly verify authorization state to prevent logic bypass.

unsafe_reflection.description: The app validates and sanitizes all untrusted inputs. Avoid using reflection with untrusted input to prevent code execution.

webview_file_access.description: The app uses WebViews securely. Disable file access in WebViews unless explicitly required and secured.

insecure_deserialization.description: The app validates and sanitizes all untrusted inputs. Avoid deserializing untrusted data to prevent remote code execution.

strandhogg.description: The app uses the user interface securely. Configure launch modes and task affinities to prevent task hijacking attacks.

hardcoded_secrets_xml.description: The app prevents leakage of sensitive data. Ensure no sensitive data is stored in resource files like strings.xml.
